meanings.definition: Having similarity in size, shape, and relative position of corresponding parts.
meanings.sent1: The two sides of the butterfly wings were symmetric.
meanings.sent2: The symmetric design of the building made it look balanced.
meanings.sent3: The symmetric cupcakes were a hit at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her symmetric hairstyle framed her face perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The symmetric pattern on the wallpaper was mesmerizing.

meanings.sent1: The snowflake had a symmetric shape.
meanings.sent2: The symmetric painting hung perfectly in the gallery.
meanings.sent3: The symmetric dance routine impressed the audience.
meanings.sent4: The symmetric reflection in the mirror was flawless.
meanings.sent5: The symmetric garden layout was pleasing to the eye.

meanings.definition: Corresponding in size, shape, and relative position.
meanings.sent1: The symmetric keys fit perfectly into the locks.
meanings.sent2: The symmetric arrangement of the furniture made the room look neat.
meanings.sent3: The symmetric rows of trees lined the path beautifully.
meanings.sent4: The symmetric pairs of shoes were neatly displayed.
meanings.sent5: The symmetric faces of the twins were identical.
